description:
"Cleaners" Shin and Noi get to work in the Hole. Meanwhile, Caiman and Nikaido search for a sorcerer who uses acupuncture to change faces.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Fukuro no Naka / Shokuji Chuu wa Oshizuka ni / Tonari no Machi no Mahou Tsukai
In the Bag / Eat Quietly During Meals / My Neighbor the Sorcerer
袋の中 / 食事中はお静かに / 隣の町の魔法使い
